entry.def: Theft is the crime of stealing.

example.ex: Art theft is now part of organised crime.

example.ex: ...the theft of classified documents from a car in London.

Sentence.sentence: On the other hand,there have been hundreds of thefts and cases of deliberate damaging of public property, which usually involves breaking windows or lights or writing on walls.
The thefts are not the carefully planned burglaries(入室盗窃)that you see in movies
Walk around and guard against car theft.
